TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Imaging extends System.Object
public ref class Imaging abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供 Managed 到 Unmanaged 的互通支援，以便建立影像物件。

span.span: Provides managed to unmanaged interoperation support for creating image objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會提供建立機制主要映像中的類別的點陣圖[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]， 。This class provides creation mechanisms for the primary bitmap imaging class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], . 這包括建立的方法根據[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gdi](~/includes/tlasharptla-gdi-md.md)]物件，以及記憶體區段。This includes methods that create a based on [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gdi](~/includes/tlasharptla-gdi-md.md)] objects , and memory sections.
